```pddl
[
  (:action choose
    :parameters (?p - player ?item - object ?loc - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?loc) (available ?item ?loc) (or (nursery ?loc) (garden_center ?loc)))
    :effect (and (inventory ?p ?item) (not (available ?item ?loc)))
  ),
  
  (:action establish
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?entity - object ?context - context)
    :precondition (and (exists ?entity ?context) (not (established ?entity ?context)))
    :effect (established ?entity ?context)
  ),
  
  (:action establish_plant
    :parameters (?p - player ?plant - plant ?container - container)
    :precondition (planted ?plant ?container)
    :effect (established ?plant ?container)
  ),
  
  (:action plant
    :parameters (?p - player ?plant - plant ?container - container ?soil - soil)
    :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?plant) (inventory ?p ?container) (inventory ?p ?soil))
    :effect (and (planted ?plant ?container) (not (inventory ?p ?plant)))
  ),
  
  (:action re_pot
    :parameters (?npc - person ?plant - plant ?container - container ?loc - location)
    :precondition (and 
                    (available ?plant ?loc)
                    (or (nursery ?loc) (garden_center ?loc))
                    (broad ?container)
                    (rounded ?container)
                    (established ?plant ?container))
    :effect (and 
              (planted ?plant ?container)
              (established ?plant ?container)
              (re_potted ?plant ?container))
  )
]
```
